title: Liberal Reformist Party (Dominican Republic)
text: The Liberal Reformist Party ( or "PRL"), formerly Liberal Party of the Dominican Republic ( or "PLRD") is a <a href="Liberalism">liberal</a> <a href="political%20party">political party</a> in the <a href="Dominican%20Republic">Dominican Republic</a>. The party was originally named La Estructura, the name under which it contested the <a href="1986%20Dominican%20Republic%20general%20election">1986 general elections</a> as part of an alliance with the defeated <a href="Dominican%20Revolutionary%20Party">Dominican Revolutionary Party</a>. For the <a href="1990%20Dominican%20Republic%20general%20election">1990 elections</a> it changed its allegiance to the victorious <a href="Social%20Christian%20Reformist%20Party">Social Christian Reformist Party</a>. For the <a href="2006%20Dominican%20Republic%20parliamentary%20election">2006 elections</a> it was part of the victorious <a href="Progressive%20Bloc">Progressive Bloc</a>.
